languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает мрачный взгляд на могучих воинов, однако не перечит им — то ли из согласия, то ли из сомнения в том, что переживет это возражение.{/n}
{n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает мрачный взгляд на могучих воинов, однако не перечит им — то ли из согласия, то ли из сомнения в том, что переживет это возражение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは険しい目つきで屈強な戦士たちを一瞥するが、ふたりに反論することはない。同意していないのか、異を唱えれば己は生き延びられるか怪しいと考えているのか。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは険しい目つきで屈強な戦士たちを一瞥するが、ふたりに反論することはない。同意していないのか、異を唱えれば己は生き延びられるか怪しいと考えているのか。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希冷冷地看了一眼强壮的战士们，但并没有出言反驳。这或许是他默认了这种说法，又或许是他不确定出言反驳是否会惹恼他们。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希冷冷地看了一眼强壮的战士们，但并没有出言反驳。折或许是他默认了这种说法，又或许是他不确定出言反驳是否会惹恼他们。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lance un regard sévère aux puissants guerriers, sans toutefois les contredire ; peut-être parce qu'il est d'accord, ou bien parce qu'il doute de sa survie s'il devait soulever une objection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lance un regard sévère aux puissants guerriers, sans toutefois les contredire ; peut-être parce qu'il est d'accord, ou bien parce qu'il doute de sa survie s'il devait soulever une objection.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada sombría a aquellos extraordinarios guerreros, pero no les llega a contradecir, ya sea por desacuerdo o por dudar de su propia supervivencia si planteara una objeción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada sombría a aquellos extraordinarios guerreros, pero no les llega a contradecir, ya sea por desacuerdo o por dudar de su propia supervivencia si planteara una objeción.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft einen grimmigen Blick auf die mächtigen Krieger, widerspricht ihnen aber nicht, sei es aus Zustimmung oder Unsicherheit ob seines Überlebens im Falle eines Einwandes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft einen grimmigen Blick auf die mächtigen Krieger, widerspricht ihnen aber nicht, sei es aus Zustimmung oder Unsicherheit ob seines Überlebens im Falle eines Einwandes.
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, heybetli savaşçılara kasvet dolu bir bakış atıyor ama onlara karşı gelmiyor. Belki itiraz etmekten korkuyor, belki de itiraz edecek bir şey görmüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a grim glance at the mighty warriors, but does not contradict them, either out of agreement, or doubt about his survival were he to raise an objection.{/n}
